settings.name: Radius parameter for First Passage Time
settings.description: Define the radius for which you want to calculate the first passage times (when does an animal pass the radius). Unit = m. Default 30000 m = 30 km

settings.name: Threshold time for migration/resting
settings.description: Define the time threshold with which you will split your tracks into fast and slow movement locations. This is the minimum time your animals need to pass a given radius (above) if resting. Select your time unit below. Default = 10 (days).

settings.name: Unit of your threshold time
settings.description: Select the time unit of your selected threshold time.
